frame_eqs_str: a['decay']=1; a['vol']=(((a['bass']+a['mid'])+a['treb'])*0.55); a['vol']=a['vol']; a['mv_r']=(0.5+(0.4*Math.sin((a['time']*1.324)))); a['mv_g']=(0.5+(0.4*Math.cos((a['time']*1.371)))); a['zoom']=0.9; a['musictime']=(a['musictime']+a['vol']); a['q4']=0; a['q5']=0; a['dx']=(Math.sin((a['musictime']*0.1))*0.07); a['dy']=(Math.cos((a['musictime']*0.069))*0.07); a['monitor']=a['rot'];
